rows.label: soul30_P0101
rows.name:
I'm going on ahead, sweetie.
 You help me up front.

rows.label: soul30_P0102
rows.name:
They're afraid? How cute!
 Stagger them with melee!

rows.label: soul30_P0103
rows.name:
Some melee attacks ought
 to liven this place right up!

rows.label: soul30_P0201
rows.name:
They must really like bullets.
 Let's not disappoint them!

rows.label: soul30_P0202
rows.name:
Safety first.
 A buff, if you please!

rows.label: soul30_P0203
rows.name:
Weaken them and I'll
 finish them off for you!

rows.label: soul30_P0301
rows.name:
Too forward for you? Oh, it's
 about to get more intimate!

rows.label: soul30_P0302
rows.name:
I'm going in for a quickie!
 Snipe the enemy down!

rows.label: soul30_P0303
rows.name:
Always be prepared. Let's
 get an aura up, shall we?

rows.label: soul30_P0401
rows.name:
Feeling a little woozy...
 Can I get a pick-me-up?

rows.label: soul30_P0402
rows.name:
You can never be too careful.
 Assist me with a buff!

rows.label: soul30_P0403
rows.name:
I would hate to lose now.
 Would you mind buffing me?

rows.label: soul30_P0501
rows.name:
Ugh, I'm at my limit...
 Come on, heal me!

rows.label: soul30_P0502
rows.name:
I can't take any more of this
 teasing! Heal me up, now!

rows.label: soul30_P0503
rows.name:
I'll fight to the very edge!
 Now give me a buff...

rows.label: soul30_P0601
rows.name:
Show me one last time...
 An attack for the ages...!

rows.label: soul30_P0602
rows.name:
Ohh, I'm spent... Blow away
 that wretch for me...

rows.label: soul30_P0603
rows.name:
Take care...
 Use an aura for protection.

rows.label: soul30_P0701
rows.name:
Aww, does it hurt?
 Keep attacking up close!

rows.label: soul30_P0702
rows.name:
Dishing out pain is what I do.
 Blast them through!

rows.label: soul30_P0703
rows.name:
Hee hee, looks painful...
 I won't let you go just yet!

rows.label: soul30_P0801
rows.name:
Ready to pop here, too? Hah.
 I'll strike you some more.

rows.label: soul30_P0802
rows.name:
See, told you it'd blow!
 Now topple them at range!

rows.label: soul30_P0803
rows.name:
No mercy for the broken,
 darling. Make them kneel!

rows.label: soul30_P0901
rows.name:
I guess size isn't everything.
 Finish them with your guns!

rows.label: soul30_P0902
rows.name:
All bark and no bite. Buff me
 up and let's flatten them!

rows.label: soul30_P0903
rows.name:
I've had enough of these
 bigshots. Time for Overclock!

rows.label: soul30_P1001
rows.name:
They like the pain. So let's
 make them writhe in agony!

rows.label: soul30_P1002
rows.name:
Beautiful timing!
 Now fire away!

rows.label: soul30_P1003
rows.name:
Ready to submit? Or should
 we weaken you even more?

rows.label: soul30_P1101
rows.name:
Ohh, this swell of power...!
 An aura! Give it to me!

rows.label: soul30_P1102
rows.name:
It takes two to tango.
 Give me an aura!

rows.label: soul30_P1103
rows.name:
My heart races!
 Let's buff each other up!

rows.label: soul30_P1201
rows.name:
I'm like a ravenous beast!
 Activate Overclock!

rows.label: soul30_P1202
rows.name:
Hee hee, and here it is...
 Show them some Overclock!

rows.label: soul30_P1203
rows.name:
I'm never giving up on you!
 An aura, please!

rows.label: soul30_C0101
rows.name:
Oh? Over so soon?
 Keep them at close quarters!

rows.label: soul30_C0102
rows.name:
Thanks, that was fun.
 But now...ranged attacks!

rows.label: soul30_C0103
rows.name:
It's not over yet!
 Load me up with a buff!

rows.label: soul30_C0201
rows.name:
You can look, but not touch!
 How about an aura assist?

rows.label: soul30_C0202
rows.name:
Thought you could hit me,
 did you? Time for buffing!

rows.label: soul30_C0203
rows.name:
So droll... Ranged attacks
 ought to spice this up a bit!

rows.label: soul30_C0301
rows.name:
So eager for punishment?
 Why don't we indulge them!

rows.label: soul30_C0302
rows.name:
That feel good? Then ranged
 attacks will feel simply divine!

rows.label: soul30_C0303
rows.name:
I love the way it feels,
 with you under my boot!

rows.label: soul30_C0401
rows.name:
Ugh, this weather is so
 passé. Buff and forget!

rows.label: soul30_C0402
rows.name:
Sadistic weather...
 An aura should tide me over!

rows.label: soul30_C0403
rows.name:
Miran weather is so direct!
 Let's weaken them as well!

rows.label: soul30_C0501
rows.name:
Keep up! I could use a
 good buff right now!

rows.label: soul30_C0502
rows.name:
You like it rough? Oh I'll be
 rock hard with a buff!

rows.label: soul30_C0503
rows.name:
How do you want it?
 Overclock? All over, then!

rows.label: soul30_C0601
rows.name:
Is that an invitation? Smack
 them and I'll think about it.

rows.label: soul30_C0602
rows.name:
I like a man who gives his all.
 Oh, and shooting the enemy.

rows.label: soul30_C0603
rows.name:
I feel your passion in my
 veins! But first, an aura!

rows.label: soul30_C0701
rows.name:
You're gentle...unlike me.
 Freshen me up with a buff!

rows.label: soul30_C0702
rows.name:
You have my undivided
 attention. Buff me up!

rows.label: soul30_C0703
rows.name:
I can be good to you.
 Make me shine with an aura!

rows.label: soul30_C0801
rows.name:
So this is...pain...
 I'll make it hurt tenfold!

rows.label: soul30_C0802
rows.name:
Honey, I'm just getting
 started. Focus your fire!

rows.label: soul30_C0803
rows.name:
Think you've won, do you?
 Oh, I'll show them. Buff me!

rows.label: soul30_C0901
rows.name:
I'm a master of surprise.
 Turn them into a pincushion!

rows.label: soul30_C0902
rows.name:
You like it from above?
 Everyone, shoot your shot!

rows.label: soul30_C0903
rows.name:
You didn't expect that one,
 did you? Keep pelting them!

rows.label: soul30_C1001
rows.name:
So you wanna roll around
 with me? Knock them down!

rows.label: soul30_C1002
rows.name:
How pathetic... Open fire!
 Get them out of my sight!

rows.label: soul30_C1003
rows.name:
Kiss the dirt.
 Weaken them, body and soul!

rows.label: soul30_C1101
rows.name:
I love it when they're
 helpless... Lay into them!

rows.label: soul30_C1102
rows.name:
Bind! Constrict! Shackle!
 Gonna fire your payload?

rows.label: soul30_C1103
rows.name:
There's no getting away...
 Weaken them some more!

rows.label: soul30_C1201
rows.name:
Sleepy, are we? Well, that
 won't fly. Rise and shine!

rows.label: soul30_C1202
rows.name:
You get sleepy, you get
 sprayed—no exceptions!

rows.label: soul30_C1203
rows.name:
Nighty-night... Now wake
 them up with a real zinger!

rows.label: soul30_C1301
rows.name:
Look who I've caught...
 Give them the full treatment!

rows.label: soul30_C1302
rows.name:
You're not going anywhere.
 Punch them full of holes!

rows.label: soul30_C1303
rows.name:
I'm not letting you go! Give
 them a good you-know-what!

rows.label: soul30_C1401
rows.name:
Okay, that's too far now!
 Time out!

rows.label: soul30_C1402
rows.name:
This play has gotten a little
 too rough... Now it's my turn!

rows.label: soul30_C1403
rows.name:
They hurt my Doll?! Ugh!
 Make them pay!

rows.label: soul30_C1501
rows.name:
Oh, this is unpleasant...
 Get me back on my feet!

rows.label: soul30_C1502
rows.name:
You'll pay for this!!!
 Your buffs, everyone!

rows.label: soul30_C1503
rows.name:
I love their commitment. Let's
 repay them with Overclock!

rows.label: soul30_C1601
rows.name:
I hate running on empty.
 Replenish me with a buff!

rows.label: soul30_C1602
rows.name:
Some healing here? I can't
 perform without a little fuel.

rows.label: soul30_C1603
rows.name:
Let me stay in the hot seat
 a little longer, won't you?
